Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    85778-9 Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] by Target amplification with non-probe based detection in Positive blood culture
